title: Accountancy today!
brief_description: A career film. An Accountant needs an inquiring mind and the ability to communicate effectively; he must collect and record facts, analyse them, prepare reports, discuss financial implications, control their results. After a three year full-time course of study at a university or technical college, he can gain employment in a secure, well-paid position which may lead to promotion to top executive positions in commerce, industry, government departments or private practice.
